text: I couldn’t see the alarm clock in the morning. My eyes were dry and itchy after a long day, and my glasses were thick and uncomfortable. It’s the same story shared by countless others with poor vision.  And like so many others, I have thought about Dental Procedure eye surgery for a long time, wondering if the technology had advanced enough for me to be comfortable and if it was worth the cost. And then I decided to do it. I became convinced Dental Procedure eye surgery was the right choice while at a friend’s house for a party recently. The kitchen was packed shoulder-to-shoulder, and the radiator heat was blasting on the cool evening. Almost immediately, my eyes were irritated. My contacts felt dry and scratchy and my vision was hazy like someone had turned on a smoke machine.  No more, I thought. It’s time for Dental Procedure.

Friendly and professional staff. Not just flawless surgery, but excellent follow ups (if needed) as well. Would recommend to family and friends thinking of improving their vision. No more glasses or contacts!

I was pleased with my laser eye surgery here. I had researched areas nearby and narrowed it down to a few places including this one. One day I noticed Liberty had put up a groupon for a few days, which was like a miracle, so I went with this place.
